markets.title: Will be the block difficulty for Ethereum Mainnet be higher than 3000?
markets.when: The block difficulty is higher than 3000
markets.whenNot: The block difficulty is lower than 3000

markets.title: Will be the Ethereum Mainnet block gas limit be greater than 8.000.500?
markets.when: The block gas limit is higher than 8.000.500
markets.whenNot: The block gas limit is lower than 8.000.500

markets.title: What that other block difficulty thing (testing)?
markets.when: That other thing is higher than 2000
markets.whenNot: That other thing is lower than 2000

markets.title: What will be the block difficulty for Ethereum Mainnet on 31st of January, 2019?
markets.description: Will the difficulty be higher than 3000 or lower?

outcomes.title: Difficulty will be equal or higher than 3000

markets.title: What will be the Ethereum Mainnet block gas limit on 31st of January, 2019?
markets.description: Will the block gas limit be greater than 8,000,5000 or lower?

outcomes.title: Block Gas Limit will be lower than 8000500
Block Gas Limit will be higher or equal than 8000500

markets.title: What will be the price of ETH in USD on 31st of January, 2019?
markets.description: Will the ETH price in USD be higher than 150 USD or lower?

outcomes.title: Block Gas Limit will be lower than 150 USD
Block Gas Limit will be higher or equal than 150 USD
